{int (optional)} `total-record-bytes` Total bytes recorded since the recording started.

recording.description:
Start recording.
Will return an `error` if recording is already active.
recording.name: StartRecording

recording.description:
Stop recording.
Will return an `error` if recording is not active.
recording.name: StopRecording

recording.description: Get the path of  the current recording folder.
recording.name: GetRecordingFolder

replay buffer.description:
Start recording into the Replay Buffer.
Will return an `error` if the Replay Buffer is already active or if the
"Save Replay Buffer" hotkey is not set in OBS' settings.
Setting this hotkey is mandatory, even when triggering saves only
through obs-websocket.
replay buffer.name: StartReplayBuffer

replay buffer.description:
Stop recording into the Replay Buffer.
Will return an `error` if the Replay Buffer is not active.
replay buffer.name: StopReplayBuffer

replay buffer.description:
Flush and save the contents of the Replay Buffer to disk. This is
basically the same as triggering the "Save Replay Buffer" hotkey.
Will return an `error` if the Replay Buffer is not active.
replay buffer.name: SaveReplayBuffer

scene items.description: Gets the scene specific properties of the specified source item.
param: {String (optional)} `scene` the name of the scene that the source item belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.
return: {String} `item.id` The id of the scene item.
{int} `item.position.x` The x position of the source from the left.
{int} `item.position.y` The y position of the source from the top.
{int} `item.position.alignment` The point on the source that the item is manipulated from.
{double} `item.rotation` The clockwise rotation of the item in degrees around the point of alignment.
{double} `item.scale.x` The x-scale factor of the source.
{double} `item.scale.y` The y-scale factor of the source.
{int} `item.crop.top` The number of pixels cropped off the top of the source before scaling.
{int} `item.crop.right` The number of pixels cropped off the right of the source before scaling.
{int} `item.crop.bottom` The number of pixels cropped off the bottom of the source before scaling.
{int} `item.crop.left` The number of pixels cropped off the left of the source before scaling.
scene items.name: GetSceneItemProperties

returns.name: item.id
returns.description: The id of the scene item.

returns.name: item.position.x
returns.description: The x position of the source from the left.

returns.name: item.position.y
returns.description: The y position of the source from the top.

returns.name: item.position.alignment
returns.description: The point on the source that the item is manipulated from.

scene items.description: Sets the scene specific properties of a source. Unspecified properties will remain unchanged.
param: {String (optional)} `scene` the name of the scene that the source item belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.
{int} `item.position.x` The new x position of the item.
{int} `item.position.y` The new y position of the item.
{int} `item.position.alignment` The new alignment of the item.
{double} `item.rotation` The new clockwise rotation of the item in degrees.
{double} `item.scale.x` The new x scale of the item.
{double} `item.scale.y` The new y scale of the item.
{int} `item.crop.top` The new amount of pixels cropped off the top of the source before scaling.
{int} `item.crop.bottom` The new amount of pixels cropped off the bottom of the source before scaling.
{int} `item.crop.left` The new amount of pixels cropped off the left of the source before scaling.
{int} `item.crop.right` The new amount of pixels cropped off the right of the source before scaling.
{bool} `item.visible` The new visibility of the item. 'true' shows source, 'false' hides source.
{bool} `item.locked` The new locked of the item. 'true' is locked, 'false' is unlocked.
{String} `item.bounds.type` The new bounds type of the item.
{int} `item.bounds.alignment` The new alignment of the bounding box. (0-2, 4-6, 8-10)
{double} `item.bounds.x` The new width of the bounding box.
{double} `item.bounds.y` The new height of the bounding box.
scene items.name: SetSceneItemProperties

params.description: the name of the scene that the source item belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.

sources.description: List all sources available in the running OBS instance
return: {Array of Objects} `sources` Array of sources as objects

returns.name: sources.*.typeId
returns.description: Non-unique source internal type (a.k.a type id)

sources.description: Get a list of all available sources types
return: {Array of Objects} `ids` Array of sources as objects
{String} `ids.*.displayName` Display name of the source type
{String} `ids.*.type` Type. Value is one of the following: "input", "filter", "transition" or "other"
{Object} `ids.*.defaultSettings` Default settings of this source type
{Boolean} `ids.*.caps.isAsync` True if source of this type provide frames asynchronously
{Boolean} `ids.*.caps.hasVideo` True if sources of this type provide video
{Boolean} `ids.*.caps.hasAudio` True if sources of this type provide audio
{Boolean} `ids.*.caps.canInteract` True if interaction with this sources of this type is possible
{Boolean} `ids.*.caps.isComposite` True if sources of this type composite one or more sub-sources
{Boolean} `ids.*.caps.doNotDuplicate` True if sources of this type should not be fully duplicated
{Boolean} `ids.*.caps.doNotSelfMonitor` True if sources of this type may cause a feedback loop if it's audio is monitored and shouldn't be

{Object (optional)} `font` Holds data for the font. Ex: `"font": { "face": "Arial", "flags": 0, "size": 150, "style": "" }`
{int (optional)} `font.flags` Font text styling flag. `Bold=1, Italic=2, Bold Italic=3, Underline=5, Strikeout=8`
{boolean (optional)} `from_file` Read text from the specified file.
sources.name: SetTextFreetype2Properties

params.name: scene-name
params.description: Name of the scene to retrieve. Defaults to the current scene.

params.name: font
params.description: Holds data for the font. Ex: `"font": { "face": "Arial", "flags": 0, "size": 150, "style": "" }`

params.name: font.flags
params.description: Font text styling flag. `Bold=1, Italic=2, Bold Italic=3, Underline=5, Strikeout=8`

params.name: from_file
params.description: Read text from the specified file.

sources.description: Get current properties for a Browser Source.
param: {String (optional)} `scene-name` Name of the scene that the source belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.
return: {boolean} `is_local_file` Indicates that a local file is in use.
{boolean} `shutdown` Indicates whether the source should be shutdown when not visible.
sources.name: GetBrowserSourceProperties

returns.name: is_local_file
returns.description: Indicates that a local file is in use.

returns.name: shutdown
returns.description: Indicates whether the source should be shutdown when not visible.

params.name: scene-name
params.description: Name of the scene that the source belongs to. Defaults to the current scene.

sources.description: Deletes a scene item.
param: {String (optional)} `scene` Name of the scene the source belogns to. Defaults to the current scene.
{String} `item.name` name of the scene item (prefer `id`, including both is acceptable).
sources.name: DeleteSceneItem

params.name: scene
params.description: Name of the scene the source belogns to. Defaults to the current scene.

params.name: item.name
params.description: name of the scene item (prefer `id`, including both is acceptable).

sources.description: Duplicates a scene item.
param: {String (optional)} `fromScene` Name of the scene to copy the item from. Defaults to the current scene.
{String (optional)} `toScene` Name of the scene to create the item in. Defaults to the current scene.
{String} `item.name` name of the scene item (prefer `id`, including both is acceptable).
sources.name: DuplicateSceneItem

params.name: fromScene
params.description: Name of the scene to copy the item from. Defaults to the current scene.

params.name: toScene
params.description: Name of the scene to create the item in. Defaults to the current scene.

params.name: item.name
params.description: name of the scene item (prefer `id`, including both is acceptable).

sources.description: Get configured special sources like Desktop Audio and Mic/Aux sources.
return: {String (optional)} `desktop-1` Name of the first Desktop Audio capture source.
{String (optional)} `desktop-2` Name of the second Desktop Audio capture source.
{String (optional)} `mic-1` Name of the first Mic/Aux input source.
{String (optional)} `mic-2` Name of the second Mic/Aux input source.
{String (optional)} `mic-3` NAme of the third Mic/Aux input source.
sources.name: GetSpecialSources

returns.name: desktop-1
returns.description: Name of the first Desktop Audio capture source.

returns.name: desktop-2
returns.description: Name of the second Desktop Audio capture source.

returns.name: mic-1
returns.description: Name of the first Mic/Aux input source.

returns.name: mic-2
returns.description: Name of the second Mic/Aux input source.

returns.name: mic-3
returns.description: NAme of the third Mic/Aux input source.

streaming.description: Get current streaming and recording status.
return: {String (optional)} `stream-timecode` Time elapsed since streaming started (only present if currently streaming).
{String (optional)} `rec-timecode` Time elapsed since recording started (only present if currently recording).
streaming.name: GetStreamingStatus

returns.name: stream-timecode
returns.description: Time elapsed since streaming started (only present if currently streaming).

returns.name: rec-timecode
returns.description: Time elapsed since recording started (only present if currently recording).

streaming.description:
Start streaming.
Will return an `error` if streaming is already active.
param: {Object (optional)} `stream` Special stream configuration. Please note: these won't be saved to OBS' configuration.

{String (optional)} `stream.type` If specified ensures the type of stream matches the given type (usually 'rtmp_custom' or 'rtmp_common'). If the currently configured stream type does not match the given stream type, all settings must be specified in the `settings` object or an error will occur when starting the stream.

{Object (optional)} `stream.metadata` Adds the given object parameters as encoded query string parameters to the 'key' of the RTMP stream. Used to pass data to the RTMP service about the streaming. May be any String, Numeric, or Boolean field.
{String (optional)} `stream.settings.key` The publish key of the stream.
{boolean (optional)} `stream.settings.use-auth` Indicates whether authentication should be used when connecting to the streaming server.
{String (optional)} `stream.settings.username` If authentication is enabled, the username for the streaming server. Ignored if `use-auth` is not set to `true`.
{String (optional)} `stream.settings.password` If authentication is enabled, the password for the streaming server. Ignored if `use-auth` is not set to `true`.
streaming.name: StartStreaming

params.name: stream
params.description: Special stream configuration. Please note: these won't be saved to OBS' configuration.

params.name: stream.type
params.description: If specified ensures the type of stream matches the given type (usually 'rtmp_custom' or 'rtmp_common'). If the currently configured stream type does not match the given stream type, all settings must be specified in the `settings` object or an error will occur when starting the stream.

params.name: stream.metadata
params.description: Adds the given object parameters as encoded query string parameters to the 'key' of the RTMP stream. Used to pass data to the RTMP service about the streaming. May be any String, Numeric, or Boolean field.

params.name: stream.settings.key
params.description: The publish key of the stream.

params.name: stream.settings.use-auth
params.description: Indicates whether authentication should be used when connecting to the streaming server.

params.name: stream.settings.username
params.description: If authentication is enabled, the username for the streaming server. Ignored if `use-auth` is not set to `true`.

params.name: stream.settings.password
params.description: If authentication is enabled, the password for the streaming server. Ignored if `use-auth` is not set to `true`.

streaming.description:
Stop streaming.
Will return an `error` if streaming is not active.
streaming.name: StopStreaming

streaming.description: Sets one or more attributes of the current streaming server settings. Any options not passed will remain unchanged. Returns the updated settings in response. If 'type' is different than the current streaming service type, all settings are required. Returns the full settings of the stream (the same as GetStreamSettings).
param: {String} `type` The type of streaming service configuration, usually `rtmp_custom` or `rtmp_common`.
{Object} `settings` The actual settings of the stream.
{boolean (optional)} `settings.use-auth` Indicates whether authentication should be used when connecting to the streaming server.
{String (optional)} `settings.username` The username for the streaming service.
{String (optional)} `settings.password` The password for the streaming service.
streaming.name: SetStreamSettings

params.name: type
params.description: The type of streaming service configuration, usually `rtmp_custom` or `rtmp_common`.

params.name: settings
params.description: The actual settings of the stream.

params.name: settings.use-auth
params.description: Indicates whether authentication should be used when connecting to the streaming server.

params.name: settings.username
params.description: The username for the streaming service.

params.name: settings.password
params.description: The password for the streaming service.

streaming.description: Get the current streaming server settings.
return: {String} `type` The type of streaming service configuration. Possible values: 'rtmp_custom' or 'rtmp_common'.
{String} `settings.key` The publish key of the stream.
{boolean} `settings.use-auth` Indicates whether audentication should be used when connecting to the streaming server.
{String} `settings.username` The username to use when accessing the streaming server. Only present if `use-auth` is `true`.
{String} `settings.password` The password to use when accessing the streaming server. Only present if `use-auth` is `true`.
streaming.name: GetStreamSettings

returns.name: type
returns.description: The type of streaming service configuration. Possible values: 'rtmp_custom' or 'rtmp_common'.

returns.name: settings.key
returns.description: The publish key of the stream.

returns.name: settings.use-auth
returns.description: Indicates whether audentication should be used when connecting to the streaming server.

returns.name: settings.username
returns.description: The username to use when accessing the streaming server. Only present if `use-auth` is `true`.

returns.name: settings.password
returns.description: The password to use when accessing the streaming server. Only present if `use-auth` is `true`.

streaming.description: Save the current streaming server settings to disk.
streaming.name: SaveStreamSettings

studio mode.description: Indicates if Studio Mode is currently enabled.
studio mode.return: {boolean} `studio-mode` Indicates if Studio Mode is enabled.
studio mode.name: GetStudioModeStatus

returns.name: studio-mode
returns.description: Indicates if Studio Mode is enabled.

studio mode.description:
Get the name of the currently previewed scene and its list of sources.
Will return an `error` if Studio Mode is not enabled.
return: {String} `name` The name of the active preview scene.
studio mode.name: GetPreviewScene

returns.name: name
returns.description: The name of the active preview scene.

studio mode.description:
Set the active preview scene.
Will return an `error` if Studio Mode is not enabled.
studio mode.param: {String} `scene-name` The name of the scene to preview.
studio mode.name: SetPreviewScene

params.name: scene-name
params.description: The name of the scene to preview.

studio mode.description:
Transitions the currently previewed scene to the main output.
Will return an `error` if Studio Mode is not enabled.
param: {Object (optional)} `with-transition` Change the active transition before switching scenes. Defaults to the active transition.
studio mode.name: TransitionToProgram

params.name: with-transition
params.description: Change the active transition before switching scenes. Defaults to the active transition.

transitions.description: List of all transitions available in the frontend's dropdown menu.
return: {String} `current-transition` Name of the currently active transition.
transitions.name: GetTransitionList

returns.name: current-transition
returns.description: Name of the currently active transition.

transitions.description: Get the name of the currently selected transition in the frontend's dropdown menu.
return: {int (optional)} `duration` Transition duration (in milliseconds) if supported by the transition.
transitions.name: GetCurrentTransition

returns.name: duration
returns.description: Transition duration (in milliseconds) if supported by the transition.

transitions.description: Set the duration of the currently selected transition if supported.
transitions.param: {int} `duration` Desired duration of the transition (in milliseconds).
transitions.name: SetTransitionDuration

params.name: duration
params.description: Desired duration of the transition (in milliseconds).

transitions.description: Get the duration of the currently selected transition if supported.
transitions.return: {int} `transition-duration` Duration of the current transition (in milliseconds).
transitions.name: GetTransitionDuration

returns.name: transition-duration
returns.description: Duration of the current transition (in milliseconds).
